Submodules

src.models.residential.residential_block module

The purpose of this module is to buid and hold a persistent residential model in ConcreteModel format This block can be updated/interrogated to update pricing & load in an iterative solve Or can be passed on as a block to a unified model

class src.models.residential.residential_block.ResidentialBlock(*args, **kwds)[source]

Bases: ConcreteModel

poll_load() → dict[EI, float][source]

A quick pull of the parameter data for use in iterative solving

update_load(prices, price_index)[source]

a quick relay to the residential module updating routines
